item.title: 5-Year Career Aspirations
item.description:
5 years is a long time. Here’s what Steve Jobs has to say about it.

“I think about a year or two, three down the road; we have some projects at Apple that are sort of maybe four years down the road. Five years? Probably like three or four at the most, because things change too much… you can be going down a path, you say, ‘Well in 5 years I want to be here,’ but then something new happens and you just say, ‘Forget that, I want to be over there.’ So most of this 5-year planning that I’ve seen in my lifeâ€”some of it’s essential, but most of it changes too quickly”
